system.description: The Ogryn can wield Basic and Thrown Ranged Weapons, as well as Melee Weapons that do not have the Ogryn-Proof Trait as if they did not have the Clumsy Trait. Any of these weapons that would require Two Hands do not when wielded by this Ogryn.

specialAbilities.name: Improved Manual Dexterity
specialAbilities.description: You can wield Basic, Thrown, and Melee weapons without Ogryn-Proof trait as if you did not have Clumsy. Weapons requiring two hands count as one-handed for you.
